title: Ireland's new national air quality forecast goes live today - TheJournal.ie
summary: The Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has launched a national air quality forecast online, allowing people to plan outdoor activities based on predicted daily air quality. The forecast provides maps showing air quality levels based on the Air Quality Index for Health (AQIH), incorporating data from 114 monitoring stations around Ireland.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 924110 - Administration of Environmental Quality Programs, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services, 541330 - Engineering Services, 928110 - National Security
